turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 2016 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament.
turn.1: The lowest-seeded team in tournament history, the SMU Mustangs, won the national championship in 1985,
turn.2: However, three lower seeds, all No. 11, have advanced to that stage (in 1986, 2006, and 2011).
turn.3: Kansas has the longest active streak of any team in the tournament,
turn.4: Kansas extended its streak of consecutive tournament appearances to 27 in a row, making every NCAA Tournament dating back to 1990.
turn.5: North Carolina had made the most consecutive tournaments in the past, but hasn't made it since 1975.
turn.6: This tied the record for most consecutive NCAA Tournament appearances held by North Carolina (1975–2001).
turn.7: Villanova won the 2016 tournament in its first year of existence.
turn.8: This Tournament marked the first championship for Villanova in 31 years.
turn.9: Is there any other interesting information?
turn.10: It was also the first championship by a school without a Division I FBS football team since Connecticut in 1999.
turn.12: Villanova fields a Division I FCS football team, as did UConn before 2002.
